channel.title: Projects on Ruchil Sharma
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Ruchil Sharma

item.title: I've started shipping code
item.description: Not too long ago, I used to introduce myself as someone who didn’t write code. Well, things have changed! With the rise of AI, especially since the introduction of ChatGPT, I am absolutely amazed by the capabilities of AI in assisting me with coding and building projects. I had a strong desire to create my own website after successfully launching one using Jekyll in 2020, but I was struggling with customizing it to my liking.
